bug.author: fanyun-sun
bug.description: when I run train.py with the flag --visualize, the following error occurs. KeyError: "The name 'generate_rpn_proposals/probs:0' refers to a Tensor which does not exist. The operation, 'generate_rpn_proposals/probs', do es not exist in the graph."

comments.comment: Ah. I'll correct the name. These visualization code wasn't maintained for a while.
Just to inform you that there are still many unfixed errors in the function visualize in train.py.
OK.. I'll run it when I get a time
